metaTitle: Luxury 4-Bed Chalet in Jávea - Sea Views €1.425M | MIR0124
metaDescription: Stunning new-build chalet in Monte Olimpo, Jávea with panoramic sea & Montgo views. 4 beds, 4 baths, 1000m² plot, pool. Premium Costa Blanca location.

content.metaTitle: Luxury 4-Bed Chalet in Jávea - Sea Views €1.425M | MIR0124
content.metaDescription: Stunning new-build chalet in Monte Olimpo, Jávea with panoramic sea & Montgo views. 4 beds, 4 baths, 1000m² plot, pool. Premium Costa Blanca location.
content.heroIntro:
Discover Chalet MIR0124, an exceptional new-build luxury residence nestled in the prestigious Monte Olimpo area of Jávea. This stunning 4-bedroom, 4-bathroom chalet combines contemporary elegance with breathtaking panoramic views of the iconic Montgo Natural Park and the sparkling Mediterranean Sea, creating an unparalleled living experience on the Costa Blanca.

Set on a generous 1000m² plot in the exclusive Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar district, this masterfully designed 174m² chalet by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana represents the pinnacle of modern Mediterranean living. With its seamless integration into the natural landscape, multiple terraces, landscaped gardens, and private swimming pool, this property offers the perfect sanctuary for discerning buyers seeking luxury, privacy, and natural beauty.

locationSection.intro:
Jávea's Monte Olimpo district represents one of the Costa Blanca's most coveted residential areas, offering an exclusive hillside location that perfectly balances tranquility with convenience. Positioned between the dramatic Montgo Natural Park and the azure Mediterranean coastline, this premium location provides residents with unobstructed panoramic views while maintaining easy access to Jávea's charming town center, pristine beaches, and world-class amenities.

The Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar area is renowned for its sophisticated residential developments, excellent infrastructure, and proximity to some of Spain's most beautiful coastal landscapes. With the historic town of Jávea just minutes away and Valencia airport within easy reach, this location offers the perfect blend of Mediterranean lifestyle and international connectivity, making it highly sought-after by both permanent residents and luxury property investors.
highlights: Panoramic views of Montgo Natural Park and Mediterranean Sea
Walking distance to Jávea's award-winning beaches and marina
Close proximity to championship golf courses and luxury resorts
Easy access to Valencia airport (1 hour) and Alicante airport (1.5 hours)
Surrounded by premium residential developments and high-end amenities

propertyFeatures.intro: Chalet MIR0124 showcases exceptional contemporary design across two thoughtfully planned levels, featuring premium finishes, cutting-edge technology, and meticulous attention to detail throughout every aspect of the construction.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and natural light
4 luxury bathrooms with premium fixtures and finishes
Open-plan living and dining area with floor-to-ceiling windows
Fully equipped modern kitchen with high-end appliances
Multiple terraces maximizing outdoor living and views
Private swimming pool with sun deck and entertainment area
Beautifully landscaped 1000m² plot with Mediterranean gardens
Premium construction materials and energy-efficient systems
Panoramic sea and mountain views from key living areas

content.investmentSection:
The Costa Blanca luxury property market continues to demonstrate exceptional resilience and growth potential, with Jávea consistently ranking among Spain's most desirable coastal destinations. Properties in premium locations like Monte Olimpo have shown strong appreciation over recent years, driven by increasing international demand from Northern European buyers seeking high-quality Mediterranean lifestyle investments.

This new-build chalet represents an outstanding investment opportunity, combining the security of new construction with the established prestige of one of Jávea's most exclusive residential areas. The property's premium location, exceptional build quality, and stunning views position it perfectly for both strong rental yields and long-term capital appreciation, making it an ideal addition to any luxury property portfolio.
whyBuySection: Exclusive new-build chalet in Jávea's most prestigious residential area
Breathtaking panoramic views of Montgo Natural Park and Mediterranean Sea
Premium construction by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana with highest quality standards
Generous 1000m² plot offering privacy, gardens, and private swimming pool
Strategic location providing easy access to beaches, golf courses, and international airports
Strong investment potential in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after markets
Contemporary design perfectly integrated with natural Mediterranean landscape

faqs.question: What is the total price and what payment terms are available?
faqs.answer: Chalet MIR0124 is priced at €1,425,000. Various payment structures can be arranged during construction phases. Contact our team for detailed payment schedules and terms.

faqs.question: Where exactly is the property located and what are the nearby amenities?
faqs.answer: The chalet is located in Monte Olimpo, Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar area of Jávea, Alicante. It's close to beautiful beaches, golf courses, restaurants, shops, and just 1 hour from Valencia airport.

faqs.question: What is the buying process for international buyers in Spain?
faqs.answer: International buyers can purchase Spanish property with an NIE number. The process involves reservation, due diligence, signing contracts, and completion at notary. We guide you through every step with legal support.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange Spanish mortgage financing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we partner with Habeno Mortgage to provide competitive Spanish mortgage solutions for international buyers. Visit our mortgage link or contact us for pre-approval assistance.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for this property?
faqs.answer: Jávea luxury properties show excellent rental demand, especially for sea view properties in premium locations. Expected rental yields range from 4-6% annually, with peak season rates significantly higher.

faqs.question: When is the expected completion date?
faqs.answer: As a new construction project by Miralbo Urbana, completion timelines will be confirmed upon reservation. Construction typically takes 12-18 months from commencement. Contact us for current project timeline.

faqs.question: What is included in the purchase price?
faqs.answer: The price includes the completed villa, landscaped gardens, private pool, fitted kitchen, built-in wardrobes, and premium finishes throughout. Furnishing packages may be available separately.

faqs.question: How can I arrange a viewing of the property?
faqs.answer: Contact us via WhatsApp at our provided link, call +34 634 044 970, or request a viewing through our website. We can arrange physical or virtual tours at your convenience.

faqs.question: Are there any additional costs beyond the purchase price?
faqs.answer: Additional costs include Spanish property transfer tax (6-10%), legal fees (1-1.5%), notary fees, and registration costs. Budget approximately 10-12% of purchase price for total acquisition costs.

faqs.question: What makes this development special compared to other properties in Jávea?
faqs.answer: Chalet MIR0124 offers a rare combination of panoramic sea and mountain views, premium location in Monte Olimpo, new construction quality by Miralbo Urbana, and a generous 1000m² plot in an exclusive residential area.

content.conclusion: Chalet MIR0124 represents a rare opportunity to acquire a luxury new-build property in one of Jávea's most prestigious locations, combining exceptional sea and mountain views with contemporary design and premium construction quality. Don't miss this chance to own a piece of Costa Blanca paradise – contact us today via WhatsApp, call +34 634 044 970, or explore our mortgage solutions through Habeno to begin your journey toward luxury Mediterranean living.
